headline: Layoffs and a top exec out: what GM pullback on EVs means for you
summary: General Motors recently took its biggest step yet to address a slowing electric car industry, and it's not a minor one. GM has halted battery manufacturing in Ohio and Tennessee and reduced one of three shifts at its Detroit EV factory, resulting in the loss of approximately 1,750 jobs or temporary ...
